sourcesContent:
Password is required
Password must be at least 6 characters
Confirm Password is required
Passwords must match
First name is required. First name must be at least 3 character long. First name must be no more than 25 characters long. Passwords must match
Last name is required. Last name must be at least 3 character long. Last name must be no more than 25 characters long. Passwords must match.
